name: Comwave Telecom
tag_list: comwave, comwave-net, comwave-ca, comwave-canada, comwave-long-distance, comwave-review, comwave-toronto
overview:
Comwave is Canada’s largest private independent phone company with operation in Canada and the United States. We serve over 150 cities and communities in Canada and over 1200 in the United States.

Welcome to Comwave - A better home phone service built around you! Comwave provides reliable home phone service, customizable packages, and competitive long distance plans. Click here to find out why Comwave Home Phone is simply the most reliable phone service available. Take advantage of all the benefits of Comwave Home Phone.

We specialize in the lowest long distance rates…guaranteed! Comwave Home Phone is available across Canada. Comwave Mobile is an Unlimited Mobile Phone plan that is available across Canada

With over ten years experience providing companies with high level communications, we’re now making giant leaps forward by providing American and Canadians consumers with truly low cost long distance.

Long Distance is our specialty and in today’s competitive market we know that price and service is everything. We bring our wholesale strength to our customers and deliver to them services at dramatic savings on each and every call. We stand behind our Rate & Service Guarantee.

We’re about no non-sense. Value, Quality, Reliability, and unmatched customer care. From the very beginning we invested in Customer Care services first. While other phone companies are cutting back on Customer Care departments, we at Comwave have expanded our team and invested in technologies to improve the level of Service we are able to provide to you.

We utilize a robust coast-to-coast digital network from the leading names in the telecommunications sector including Bell Canada, Bell Nexxia, Telus, & GroupTel. They deliver reliability, we deliver price.

We are here to help.

61 Wildcat Road, Toronto M3J2P5, ON 4166639700

Visit Comwave Here: http://www.comwave.net
